issue.title: [Python] Decimal conversions are slow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2362](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2362). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1798#issuecomment-376498987

I don't know how critical performance is here, but worth keeping a note of. The `decimal` module isn't exposing an official C API, so fixing this would be a bit involved. If this is important, we can also try to push for an official decimal C API in Python (other packages may also benefit).
